title: Bar d'office Antwerpen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An eatery with co-working facilities and a veggie buffet, freshly made ​​with seasonal vegetables and more. Has vegan options. Original ingredients and combinations for an affordable price. Located on a 5 minute stroll from Antwerp Central Station, next to the design center. Also takeaway and pickup point for bio vegetables (www.jullienne.be). Room for workshops, presentations or groups.
